alert.note: Alert for Carter; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 12 at 9:08PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected with periods of moderate to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Carter and Powder River. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility producing prolonged periods of whiteout conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday and Wednesday commutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
